class.name: AWA.Storages.Models.Storage_Info
class.comment: The list of documents for a given folder.

query.name: storage-list
query.comment: Get a list of storage files for a given folder.
query.sql: SELECT st.id, st.name, st.create_date, st.uri, st.storage_type, st.mime_type, st.file_size FROM awa_storage as st INNER JOIN acl ON acl.entity_id = st.workspace_id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id WHERE st.folder_id = :folder_id
